name: This Little Piggy (Sebastian Lague)
description:
Enjoy the quiet life of a space hermit. No guns, no explosions, no surprises. Only a harmless little quest to make some potato salad.

This game was created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare #30

Programming by: @SebastianLague
Art by: @danielsound
Music by: @thiagotd
